property.name: ipAddress
property.description: IP address of the Cytec Chassis

property.name: tcpPort
property.description: TCP port number to telnet to

property.name: moduleType
property.description: The type of the mux module. e.g 2X1, 12X1, and etc.

property.name: moduleLocation
property.description: The slot or subslot number of this module. e.g. 2, 3.0, etc
